first.text: Improving upon the original Bitcoin block­chain and aims to fulfill its initial purpose.

second.text: Verge currency makes it possible to engage in direct transactions.

third.text: Verge is not a private company funded by pre-mined coins or ICO's.

wraith.title: Wraith Protocol
wraith.text1: Wraith Protocol is a technology upgrade package that enables our users to be able to send and receive payments privately across our blockchain by enabling stealth addressing services.
wraith.text2: Additionally this update removes our QT wallet users off of clearnet and migrates everyone to SSL enabled Tor.
wraith.text3: Through this system, users now have an additional layer of base IP obfuscation as well as the option to utilize stealth addressing services for their transactions.
wraith.text4: Wraith Protocol allows for complete anonymity to be maintained while providing a safe and secure method of sending and receiving Verge coins.

texts.open: Verge Currency is a 100% open-source project, and the global Verge Community represents the manpower driving it forward. Verge is not a company, there was no ICO held upon the launch and no pre-mining took place. All contributors, including the Core Team, are unpaid volunteers who donate their time and energy into the project because they are passionate and believe in Verge.
texts.use: Verge is a secure and anonymous cryptocurrency, built for everyday use.
